title: Should we be concerned with 5G network exposure? - Quora

response.answer_text: You should be more concerned about holding any cell phone to your ear when making or receiving a call or standing near a microwave oven when it is working. If you are worried about 5G, NEVER submit to a CT scan. You will probably receive more potentially harmful radiation in a 20 second scan than you will from a 5G mast 250 metres away in a year.
